Question: Make an animal sound
Put one ice cube inside your pants
Howl like a wolf
Crawl on the floor like a baby
Pretend to be the person who is sitting right next to you
Try to juggle 3 things of the group's choice
Eat a raw piece of garlic
Do 100 squats
Show us your screen time report
Keep three ice cubes in your mouth until they melt
Repeat everything the person on your right is saying until it's your turn again
Keep your eyes closed until it's your go again
Empty out your wallet/purse and show everyone what's inside
Eat a snack without using your hands
Try and make the group laugh as quickly as possible
Try to lick your elbow
Say everything in a whisper for the next 5 minutes
Talk in an American accent for the rest of the evening
Do your best celebrity impression
Play air guitar for 2 minutes straight
Tell the saddest story you know
Let someone else tickle you and try not to laugh
Give a celebrity lookalike for every person in the room
Smile as widely as you can and hold it for two minutes
Attempt the first TikTok dance on your for you page
Sit on the floor for the rest of the evening
Quack like a duck until your next turn.
Argue with a wall and pretend like it talks back for one minute.
Drink a shot of vinegar
Eat one teaspoon of the spiciest thing you can find.
Let your partner give you a makeover
Put on a blindfold and eat whatever your partner gives you
Put two drops of the spiciest sauce you have on your tongue.
Do push ups until it's your turn again
Become the slave of another person in the room for 5 minutes.
Sing the alphabet backward.
Bark loudly like a dog.
Act like a dog. Get petted by everyone.
Draw a face with a permanent marker around your belly button.
Act like an old man or an old lady.
Spin around 20 times
Act like a hippo until it is your turn again.
Show us a magic trick.
Do two cartwheels in a row.
Crawl like a worm.
Dance without music for two minutes.
Make every person in the group laugh. Keep going until everyone has cracked up.
Walk on your hands. You can ask someone to hold your legs to help you out if necessary.
Get slapped on the face by the person of your choosing.
Imagine an object. Now
Open a bag of snacks using only your mouth; no using hands or feet!
Don’t speak. Pretend to be an object. Keep pretending until someone guesses what you are.
Sit down in a spinning chair
Jump up and down as hard as you can go for two minutes.
Spin an imaginary hula hoop around your waist for the rest of the round.
Compose a poem on the spot based on something the group comes up with.
Eat a pickle.
Prank-call one of your friends.
Describe each person in the room in just one word.
Eat a bite of a banana peel.
Tell jokes until at least one of the players laughs
Show the most unflattering selfie you ever took.
Go outside and hug all the trees in the backyard.
Draw something while wearing a blindfold. And let the others guess what it is!
Spin ten times and try walking like a model on a runway around the room.
Eat a spoonful of cinnamon powder
Take a selfie with a stranger.
Drink a glass of pickle juice.
Call your parents and tell them what an amazing job they did raising you.
Give the person on your left a piggyback ride around the room.
Eat a raw vegetable.
Say “I love you” to the person on your right.
Pretend that the floor is lava and dance for 15 seconds.
